about_the_game:
This DLC is an expansion of Touhou Mystia's Izakaya, it includes:

A new region to explore - Myouren Temple!
  • You can freely explore Myouren Temple
  • Kogasa Tatara as a bond character
  • Minamitsu Murasa as a bond character
  • Nue Houjuu as a bond character
  • A mysterious new partner
  • A variety of new ingredients
  • A variety of new recipes
  • Three new vibe songs, a new overworld song and three new rock 'n' roll competition songs!

A new region to explore - Divine Spirit Mausoleum!
  • You can freely explore Divine Spirit Mausoleum
  • Seiga Kaku as a bond character
  • Soga no Tojiko as a bond character
  • Mononobe no Futo as a bond character
  • A mysterious new partner
  • A variety of new ingredients
  • A variety of new recipes
  • Three new vibe songs, a new overworld song and three cooking competition songs!

A new region to explore — XXXXXX!

Here's a little secret of ours. This DLC adds a very special map into the game which is unlocked under special conditions, letting you immerse yourself in the beauty of Gensokyo even more.
As for what kind of place this is, and where said place is, all shall be revealed in the game!

Everyone more or less has a guess who the final boss will be, but who will be the special guest this time?

We hope the new content will be a vast improvement to the game.
However, with the DLCs coming this far, some overlap is inevitable.
Our purpose for releasing these DLCs is not only to expand upon the gameplay, but also to create a more complete world of Gensokyo, as well as give more characters the chance to appear on-screen.

We hope this update can bring some comfort to those who like the more obscure characters, and we hope those who don't usually give much attention to these obscure characters can be reintroduced to their adorable likeness.


All in all, we hope you have a wonderful time!
detailed_description:
This DLC is an expansion of Touhou Mystia's Izakaya, it includes:

A new region to explore - Myouren Temple!
  • You can freely explore Myouren Temple
  • Kogasa Tatara as a bond character
  • Minamitsu Murasa as a bond character
  • Nue Houjuu as a bond character
  • A mysterious new partner
  • A variety of new ingredients
  • A variety of new recipes
  • Three new vibe songs, a new overworld song and three new rock 'n' roll competition songs!

A new region to explore - Divine Spirit Mausoleum!
  • You can freely explore Divine Spirit Mausoleum
  • Seiga Kaku as a bond character
  • Soga no Tojiko as a bond character
  • Mononobe no Futo as a bond character
  • A mysterious new partner
  • A variety of new ingredients
  • A variety of new recipes
  • Three new vibe songs, a new overworld song and three cooking competition songs!

A new region to explore — XXXXXX!

Here's a little secret of ours. This DLC adds a very special map into the game which is unlocked under special conditions, letting you immerse yourself in the beauty of Gensokyo even more.
As for what kind of place this is, and where said place is, all shall be revealed in the game!

Everyone more or less has a guess who the final boss will be, but who will be the special guest this time?

We hope the new content will be a vast improvement to the game.
However, with the DLCs coming this far, some overlap is inevitable.
Our purpose for releasing these DLCs is not only to expand upon the gameplay, but also to create a more complete world of Gensokyo, as well as give more characters the chance to appear on-screen.

We hope this update can bring some comfort to those who like the more obscure characters, and we hope those who don't usually give much attention to these obscure characters can be reintroduced to their adorable likeness.


All in all, we hope you have a wonderful time!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS
  • Processor: 2 Core CPU
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Graphic Card
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Normal Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS
  • Processor: 4 Core CPU
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1G Graphic Card
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Normal Sound Card
  • Additional Notes: 需要 64 位处理器和操作系统

short_description: This DLC is an expansion of Touhou Mystia's Izakaya. It adds Myouren Temple, Divine Spirit Mausoleum and a small extra. It also adds 6 new bond characters as well as an abundance of new content.
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, English, Korean, Japanese, Traditional Chinese
